settings.title: Settings
settings.choose_the_mail_server_to_use: Choose the mail server from which to retrieve users mailboxes
settings.mail_server_is_not_valid: This mail server is not valid
settings.mail_host_pattern: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
settings.mail_host_format: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.title_tooltip: Use Imapsync to synchronize local and remote imap accounts
tasks.delete_on_local: Delete messages on local that are not on remote (full clone)
tasks.delete_tips: Delete local messages and folders not present on the remote IMAP account
tasks.trashsync_tips: Synchronize the deleted messages and folders on the remote server
tasks.confirm_create_task_message: Confirm the settings and start the task
tasks.confirm_delete_task_message: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
tasks.encryption_depends_remote_server: The encryption is required by the remote IMAP server
tasks.no_email_server: No email server set, go to the settings
tasks.choose_local_user: Choose a local user to sync the messages
tasks.choose_the_user_to_sync: Choose a user managed by your email server to synchronize the remote messages
tasks.set_when_you_want_the_task_start: Select when to start your task
tasks.imapsync_removal_explanation: Imapsync can remove messages on remote once synchronized on the local server
tasks.delete_on_remote: Delete messages on remote once synchronized
tasks.bad_user_credentials: Verify the user credentials, the remote server refused to authenticate
tasks.Check_hostname_or_tcp_port: Verify the Hostname and the TCP port, the remote server refused to authenticate
tasks.SSL_encryption_error: Verify the TLS encryption, IMAPS or STARTTLS
tasks.localuser_string_gte: The local username cannot be empty
tasks.synchronize_folders_explanation: You can decide to make a full synchronization, only INBOX, or folders exclusion
tasks.start_by^_and_end_by$: For exact match you should start by ^ and end by $
tasks.something_wrong_cannot_list_informations: Something went wrong, we cannot list the remote and account information
tasks.fetching_statistic_please_wait: Waiting to retrieve statictics, please wait
tasks.STARTTLS_not_allowed_use_IMAPS: STARTTLS is not allowed by the provider
